item.title: Josh Groban - Believe
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of D. Lowered from the original key of E.
As performed by Josh Groban.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Charlie Puth - Done for Me
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Done For Me by Charlie Puth featuring Kehlani on the ukulele. The chords used are Bm7 Abdim7 Gmaj7 C#m7 F#7.
*The Abdim7 should be G#dim7 but I couldn't find the diagram in the chord font I use. Had to use the enharmonic.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Lea Salonga - A Whole New World
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of D and F...18 chords in all! I was originally considering changing the key...but the original key is about as ukulele friendly as you are going to find, even with some expanded chords. I think these chords work better than most of the written chord charts you will find for this song on the Internet. Enjoy!
As performed in Aladdin!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: La La Land Cast - Another Day Of Sun
item.description:
For Educational Use. In the Key of G and G#. There are fifteen chords in all. These are listed on the second screen of the video.
The original song is in Ab and A...and it becomes much easier to play in F. However, the original audio becomes strange if the pitch is modified that much. Therefore, I dropped the audio a half step to G...resulting in this play along.
The last section modulates a half step...this is pretty easy to do with the barre chords provided. That said...you need to be ready for them.
This is not a ukulele play along for beginners...but it is a great song, and advanced players should have some play along videos that challenge them, too!
The original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lV5XmoWC8Mo
The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education available from ukefarm.com. I did have to manually create some of the second position barre chords for the video (the text and chords were prepared in Keynote)
